thig5.11:1.3: As they nourish wife and children,
thig5.11:2.2: and you will have no regrets.
thig5.11:2.4: and sit down on one side.
thig5.11:3.4: and sat down to one side.
thig5.11:3.6: they followed the teachings of the Buddha.
thig5.11:4.1: In the first watch of the night,
thig5.11:4.3: In the second watch of the night,
thig5.11:4.5: In the third watch of the night,
thig5.11:4.6: they destroyed this mass of darkness.
thig5.11:5.1: They stood up and paid homage at her feet:
thig5.11:5.3: We now possess the three knowledges and are free from influences,
thig5.11:5.5: just as the thirty Devas honor Indra,
thig5.11:6.1: In this way Thirty Elder Bhikkhunīs attained perfect knowledge in the presence of Paṭācārā.
